channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The government shutdown looks on track to end this week. A House vote is the remaining hurdle.
item.description: The record-setting government shutdown appears on course to conclude in a matter of days.

item.title: I’m in my 50s and divorced with a $1.7 million home. I fell in love with an old school friend. Does it make financial sense to marry?
item.description: “I have a $500,000 Roth IRA, a portfolio account of $500,000 and $300,000 in 529 plans.”

item.title: I found an out-of-state buyer for my grandmother’s classic car. He wants me to cash a check. Is this a financial scam?
item.description: “Once the check clears, the buyer will send a trailer to pick up the car.”

item.title: CoreWeave beats on earnings, but a data-center delay is dragging on the stock
item.description: While CoreWeave locked down several large cloud deals in the third quarter, an unexpected delay in delivering capacity has some investors concerned

item.title: I’m 83 and will have $500K if I sell my house. My estranged wife wants me to join her in Colombia. Do I go?
item.description: “I can just barely handle my expenses with a mortgage payment of $984 and an income of $3,800.”

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
